headline.main: BUNA AREA FLARES IN HEAVY FIGHTING; Battle Believed Raging to Northwest Where Australians Drove Through to Coast SOME JAPANESE CUT OFF Coast Beachhead Pierced 900 Yards Below Gona -- Our Planes Fell 7 Zeros

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, Tuesday, Dec. 1 (U.P.) -- Heavy fighting has broken out on the left side of the Buna front stretching along a narrow strip of the northeastern New Guinea coast and Allied airmen, supporting their American and Australian comrades on the ground, have shot down seven more Japanese Zero fighter planes in dogfights over the front, the Allied command announced today.
abstract: other US planes bomb and strafe Buna area
